    diablo2.io Database Base Copy
    Copy this URL
     
    diablo2.io is supported by ads
    diablo2.io is supported by ads

    All Diablo 2 Resurrected Base Items

    This is a searchable, filterable, sortable database of all Diablo 2 Resurrected Base Items. It shows the latest data from Resurrected v2.8 (where indicated), and otherwise uses data from Diablo 2 v1.14 LoD. You may search, filter, or sort by weight, usage in runeword(s), number of possible sockets from Larzuk, damage/defense stats and more.
    Clears all active filters and searches.
    Start typing...
    Combining filter buttons with a search (or vice versa) is the most powerful way to filter.
    Filter items by their item type.
    Note that only one item type filter can be active at any time.
    Filter by utility properties and/or miscellaneous item qualities.
    Sort your filter selection by a number of options.
    Change viewing settings and other options.
    View results in a more traditional manner with a full-width area.
    View results with full tooltip detail & statistics on larger tiles.
    View results with reduced detail on more numerous, smaller tiles.
    View all entries that have not received the new v0.3 data.
    Data fields include:

    - Quality level for all unique items or set items
    - Treasure Class
    - Max Sockets by iLvl
    - Upped/Ebugged values
    Swords Melee Weapons Weapons Swords can have 1 sockets can have 2 sockets can have 3 sockets can have 4 sockets can have 5 sockets can have 6 sockets

    Phase Blade

    Elite Base Item

    0 0 0 1H damage: 31-35

    Deletes all Profile Fields
    Deletes all Private Messages

    Please don't use the # symbol.
    Please don't use your Battle.net ID as your username.
    If you use a fake email address, that's fine, but you will NOT be able to recover your password or receive trade notifications by email.
    Do NOT use the same password as your Battle.net account!
    Please don't use a Battle.net ID that has spaces in its username portion.

    The format is DD/MMM/YYYY, HH:MM am/pm.

    Squelches this trader, making their offers on your trades invisible to anyone except themselves. Their trade listings will also be hidden from your marketplace.
